verses.text:
Hear the pen-nies drop-ping, list-en as they fall,
Ev-'ry one for Je-sus, he shall have them all.
Now while we are lit-tle, pen-nies are our store,
But when we are big-ger, we can give much more.

Drop-ping, drop-ping, drop-ping, hear the pen-nies fall!
Ev-'ry one for Je-sus, he will get them all.

chorus.text:
Drop-ping, drop-ping, drop-ping, hear the pen-nies fall!
Ev-'ry one for Je-sus, he will get them all.
